snippet.title: Crystal Towers 2 XL Preview (Clickteam Fusion)
snippet.description:
Now on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/340250/
http://www.crystaltowers2.com

My first game release in ages is now available! Crystal Towers 2 XL is a semi-remake of Crystal Towers 2 from 2011,  adapted for widescreen and with fixes for a heap of things about the original game that hadn't bothered me quite enough to fix the first time around.
